cave in.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if the top or sides of something cave in, they fall down or inwards
cave in.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The roof of the tunnel caved in on them.
cave in.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to finally stop opposing something, especially because someone has persuaded or threatened you
cave in.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The chairman is expected to cave in to pressure from shareholders.
cave in.translation[1].definitions[0].de: when the roof of something such as a mine falls in
